Handles cell modifications.

    • changeCell

      public void changeCell(Cell cell)
      Swaps the cell numbers and positions of a new cell and an old cell by calling TextMaker.changeTwoText(Text, Text).

      Adds the new cell to the game board if the new cell is non-empty. Sets new color for the new cell according to the new cell number.

      Specified by:
      changeCell in interface CellInterface
      Parameters:
      cell - the new cell

    • adder

      public void adder(Cell cell)
      Adds two cell numbers to get its total and sets the cell color for the new totaled up cell.
      Specified by:
      adder in interface CellInterface
      Parameters:
      cell - the new cell to be added
